instruction: Make a list of 5 sentence starters that use the given conjunction.
output:
1. Even though I had my doubts, I decided to give it a try.
2. Even though it seemed impossible, I was determined to succeed.
3. Even though I knew the risks, I moved forward anyway.
4. Even though I was afraid, I kept going. 
5. Even though the odds were against me, I fought until the end.
